titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol grounds for the Greater Washington Soap Box Derby.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-515.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 163.

action.text: Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/13/1994--Introduced. Permits the Greater Washington Soap Box Derby Association to sponsor a free public event, soap box derby races, on the Capitol grounds on July 16, 1994.
